page.title: 15WILTSHIRE HERBS.
page.content:
{Herb pillows}are becoming tremendously popular.They are quite easy to make as long as you have a good supply of dried herbs.If you dont grow your own herbs you can buy from herb growers.
Making your own{cosmetics}is simple. Cleansing creams,bath oils and nourishing creams can be made to suit your own requirements.
To make{bath bags}you need small porous bags of soft cotton material. Put some tape to hang from the tap and fill with a mixture of herbs.
For{rinsing dark hair}take a handful of fresh rosemary leaves or one tablespoon of dried leaves and place them in a jug.After you have done that add 1 litre of boiling water and steep for about 30 minutes.
